login_required.en: You need to be logged in to see your chats

cannot_leave_private_chats.en: You can only leave group chats, not private chats

left_group_chat.en: You successfully left the group chat

confirm_leave_chat.en: Do you really want to leave this group chat?

cant_rejoin.en: You will not be able to rejoin without being invited

you_have_to_log_in_to_see_your_inbox.en: You have to log in to see your inbox.

please_set_a_group_name_if_youre_startin.en: Please set a group name if you're starting a chat with more than one member

please_add_one_or_more_users_to_chat_to_.en: Please add one or more users to chat to by searching them in the search bar above

type_the_name_of_the_users_you_want_to_m.en: Type the name of the user(s) you want to message.

click_here_to_send_or_press_ctrl_enter.en: Click here to send (or press ctrl + Enter)

you_have_successfully_updated_this_chats.en: You have successfully updated this chat's participants!

there_must_be_exactly_one_creator_of_an_.en: There must be exactly one creator of an organization.

search_for_users_to_add_to_this_group_ch.en: Search for users to add to this group chat

you_havent_chatted_to_anybody_yet_click_.en: You haven't chatted to anybody yet! Click on the 'New Chat' button to start reaching out to other climate actors!

this_is_the_very_beginning_of_your_conve.en: This is the very beginning of your conversation with
